to descend
Ba'ale' Yuumtzile' j éem u yil le noj caaj bey le x witzil naj cu beetico'ob ca'ach le wíinico'obo'. ― But the Lord came down to see the city and the tower the people were building. (Genesis 11:5)

Suffix indicating the first-person singular present copular; added to nouns and adjectives
Koolnáalen. ― I am a farmer.
Teen na'en. ― I am a mother.
Na'ajen. ― I am thirsty.

Suffix indicating the second-person plural imperative
Ooken! ― Enter!

drunk, intoxicated
Hach kala’anen.
I'm very drunk.
A suku’un kala’an.
Your older brother is drunk.
